attributes.review: Just terrible, once I got this app my dog died. Then my other dog. Even if that wasn’t bad enough my 3 fish died soon after. I do NOT recommend this app!

attributes.review: This app made me go POOPY IN MY PANTS. Is it bad to say I love it? Thanks bunker boy, you’re making me feel alive again. This app is terrible though ✨ it doesn’t arouse me at all. Worst porn ever. Now I’m tryna eat Cheetos though xoxo Gossip Girl
attributes.title: Poopy in my pants 🥰

attributes.review: i wanted updates about mr president and stuff so i downloaded this horrible app to see what it’s all about. my phone automatically started glitching and turning off and on. please do not get this dumb app all of ur data will be wiped off of ur device. i’m warning u all. this app needs to be deleted
attributes.title: worse then when mcdonald’s ice cream machine is broken

attributes.review: At first the app was great and then it started glitching. It kept freezing. My phone became so cold I burnt my finger tips and got freezer burn, resulting in a downward spiral of depression and suffering. Do NOT recommend.
attributes.title: Don’t waste your time

attributes.review: This app is horrible and I can’t stand to have it anymore. It keeps crashing my phone.
attributes.title: Awful
